summary:
Self-motivated and ambitions-driven leader; passionate about creating a lasting impact to society through #Tech. Top tier educational background with a First Class BCom degree from The University of Melbourne, Australia and The London School of Economics and Political Science, The United Kingdom.

I have worked and lived across Australia, South-East Asia, and Europe (particularly, The Netherlands and The UK). I have experiences working across various cultures in different settings.

Very versatile, trustworthy and hard-working would describe me best. I have experiences in managing operations at a Decacorn-sized company. I am P&L and OKRs driven -- all to ensure sustainability of the company.

Let’s connect!
E: pallangraham@gmail.com

projects.title: Global Microfinance Case Competition - Finalist
projects.description:
The annual Global Microfinance Case Competition is a competition designed to challenge students at universities across Australia and New Zealand , for a truly global problem: providing financial services for the most vulnerable and creating opportunities for change.
Based on real life problems faced by many microfinance providers around the world, student competitors will be able to use their skills and knowledge to create a practical solution to change the lives of borrowers across developing countries.

Supply Chain Planner at Multi Bintang Indonesia

projects.title: Bachelor of Commerce Case Study Competition
projects.description: BCom Case Competition requires team to provide solution at management consultant level to business challenges and problems. Solutions includes identification and deep analysis of problems, and gives strategic advise for the client company. 2015's case was about how Spotify can maintain its market share against the new entrant of Apple Music.

profile_positions.description:
Building and scaling B2B technology solutions to bring peace of mind in the travel & tourism industry, enabling travel brands, transfer companies, and travellers with the leading pre-booked Airport Transfer services.

My responsibilities are:
● Leading supply operations (quality, capacity, operational improvements, SOPs, policies) backed with data and best practices
● Team leadership: managing, mentoring, and coaching Supply team (13 FTEs, 3 Interns)
● Bridging cross-functional collaborations with Partner Success Management, Product / IT, Finance and Business Development / Sales
● Developing and implementing operational policies and procedures to enable efficient and streamlined processes
● Revenue management through pricing strategies, volume optimization, and account management.
profile_positions.title: Global Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
FreeNow (Beat) is a ride-hailing mobile app that transforms the way people move in their cities. We aspire to make urban landscapes a better place to live, re-imagining mobility solutions that are more efficient and user-friendly. 

My responsibilities are:
● Own marketplace ride-hailing business and its strategies for Argentina, Chile, and Peru markets
● Develop strategies with Local Ops teams across markets to optimize supply and demand, and maximize user experience on both ends of marketplace - Pricing & Incentives
● Act as the daily point of contact for stakeholders (LATAM Ops / Product / Engineering) and drive alignment
● Review and analyze current processes using operational metrics and reports with an eye to improve status quo
● Launch new products and test / experiment new hypothesis to optimize the marketplace (A/B testing and pre-post)
profile_positions.title: Strategy & Operations Manager (Marketplace Ops) - Argentina, Chile, Peru

profile_positions.description:
Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia, Taiwan, and Latin America. It is a platform tailored for the region, providing customers with an easy, secure and fast online shopping experience through strong payment and logistical support.

My main responsibilities are:
● Created, implemented, managed, and executed business development and growth strategies as well as initiatives across Marketplace platform (Shopee-wide regionally)
● Analyzed market landscape and strategized insights gathered from Seller Community
● Coordinated with Category Management team to ensure seller management initiatives
have high adoption rate and success rate
● Led Return & Refund flow process revamp to improve partner’s experience (seller
and buyer) and reduce contact rates with Shopee Agents - change management project
● End-to-end stakeholder management, project coordination and roll-outs from
Category Managers up to Senior Management Level
profile_positions.title: Business Development - Seller Management Project

profile_positions.description:
Grab is more than just the leading ride-hailing app in Southeast Asia. We use data and technology to improve everything from transportation to payments and logistics across Southeast Asia.

My key responsibilities are:
● Fully responsible for Malang and Satellite Cities’ top-line and bottom-line, supply and demand growth across the region
● P&L owner
● Analyze effective pricing structure for GrabCar and GrabBike (supply) and marketing strategy and promo strategy (demand) to improve GMV
● Align business strategies with functional teams such as Customer Experience, Procurement, People Operations, FP&A, Data Analytics, and Product
● Oversee and responsible for all operational processes across the Area and ensure superb customer experience
profile_positions.title: Business Ops Manager / Area Manager

profile_positions.description:
● Fully responsible for East Indonesia P&L, supply and demand growth across the region
● Analyze effective pricing structure for GrabCar and GrabBike (supply) and marketing strategy and promo strategy (demand) to improve GMV
● Align business strategies with functional teams such as Customer Experience, Procurement, People Operations, FP&A, Data Analytics, and Product
● Project management skills to improve business processes and overall P&L
●  Lead a team of up to 70 people to run business operations across the region, of which are mainly City Leads of each city
● Being a public speaker in front of a wide-range of audience to promote company's core values #TechForGood
profile_positions.title: Operations Lead East Indonesia

● Drive ideation of growth hack products through collection of feedback from customers, partners and stakeholders
● Conceptualize creative marketing and messaging strategies

in developing cities

candidates, pitching and evaluating candidates, launching, maintaining operations, and doing performance evaluation

company.name: Faculty of Business and Economics, The University of Melbourne

profile_positions.company: Faculty of Business and Economics, The University of Melbourne
profile_positions.description:
An undergraduate ambassador is a dedicated, high-achieving student who is selected by Faculty of Business and Economics (FBE) based on academic merits and significant involvements in university activities, ranging from clubs&societies and capstone programs. The ambassador also helps to promote the institution through a range of marketing, recruitment, alumni and current students activities. 

Being a Representative to the FBE as a Bachelor of Commerce, my key responsibilities include:
● Sharing stories to potential University of Melbourne students about academic experience
● Helping prospective students understand what to expect during undergraduate study during Open Day
● Engaging actively in various FBE marketing activities
● Participating in photoshoots before being profiled
profile_positions.title: Ambassador / Representative to the FBE

profile_positions.description:
Selected amongst outstanding Undergraduate and Postgraduate students for a program designed to provide the knowledge and skills for careers in finance or banking. The event comprised of talks on financial industry overview, Digital Banking, Global Consumer Banking, and Operations and Technology presented by Citi Indonesia's CEO, Managing Directors, and Head of Departments

The Citi Future Leaders Indonesia is a rigorous and an invitation-only, development program for outstanding students in Indonesia. I also established professional contacts with Citi employees and other candidates. This opportunity is a great means to unleash my potential and competitiveness in the banking career market as well as to build professional network at the world’s global financial institution.

Towards the end of the event, there was Focus Group Discussion (FGD) with the topic of Banking Industry for Millennials assessed by Citi current employees. The outcome was the selected candidates are fast-tracked to an interview for Full-Time Analyst Program.
profile_positions.title: Citi Future Leaders Indonesia 2017

profile_positions.description:
Deloitte member firms provide advisory services around M&A transactions, restructurings, raising capital, and forensic investigations. Member firms also offer multi-situational capabilities including business modeling, Public Private Partnerships, and infrastructure advisory & valuations.

My main responsibilities are:
● Assisted in calculating secured and unsecured debt with the help of Bloomberg Terminal
● Helped in finding EV/EBITDA of comparable companies using MergerMarket or Bloomberg Terminal and other internet sources
● Made macroeconomic overview as an assistance to making reports for clients
● Exposed to meetings with clients, being at client’s premises, traveling to
different places as introduction to consulting work life
● Created a news post on RSLaw 3002 - Material Corporate Transaction; it is
an aspect in determining whether or not a transaction is deemed material
which depends on the transaction's value relative to the equity of the company.
● Participated in business development with other Associates
profile_positions.title: Financial Advisory Services (FAS) - Restructuring

profile_positions.description:
The Royal Australian Air Force is a world-class military force operating some of the most advanced aircraft and defence technology in use anywhere today. The Air Force’s core purpose is the defence of Australia but the service is also called upon to fulfil many other important roles both here and overseas. Consequently, some of the army have to be taught different languages around the world, including Indonesian Language.

As an Indonesian Language Tutor, my job is to train and practice several members of Australian Army, Navy, and Air Force for interview on various topics, including but not limited to sports and food. I also act as an Interview Partner for the Australian Air Force army, because each of them will be individually examined by the teacher at the end of every session.
profile_positions.title: Indonesian Language Tutor

volunteer_experiences.description:
Together with other Executive Committee Members, we oversaw the whole activities of various divisions in the organisations, i.e. External Divisions, Internal Divisions, Media and Marketing Divisions, Corporate Relations and Career Development Divisions, Social Welfare Divisions and Sports Divisions. This surveillance also means supervising the major annual event of PPIA University of Melbourne, Indonesian Film Festival, and our biannual printings, Perspektif Magazine.

Major highlights:
- Won 2 awards from PPIA Pusat: Dana Usaha Terbaik and Program Kerja Terbaik Bidang Sosial dan Kemasyarakatan
- Saw a significant increase in funds raised, approximately amounting to $23,000

My main responsibilities are:
- Supervise the External Division in the programs that they are running
- Being appointed as one of the Project Advisors  for Indonesian Film Festival
- Manage daily cash flows which involve reducing cost in every cost centres
- Apply grants for the sake of PPIA's sustainability and report to University of Melbourne Student Union (UMSU)
- Network with fellow students within and outside University of Melbourne
- Create a lasting relationship with sponsors

First established in 2006, the Indonesian Film Festival (IFF) is the most prominent celebration of Indonesian cinema in Australia. Held annually in Melbourne, IFF is managed by a non-profit organisation, Indonesian Film Festival (IFF) Inc., with the collaboration of Melbourne University Indonesian Student Association (MUISA). IFF aims to promote the appreciation of Indonesian culture in Australia, as well as raising international awareness of the burgeoning Indonesian film culture.

The Indonesian Film Festival will be showcasing an eclectic range of commercial and art house cinema, from a particular corner of the globe often known for its striking beauty and rich culture. The festival will be exploring the cinematic development of the Indonesian film industry throughout the years. IFF pledges to deliver a high standard of cultural and educational entertainment to audiences of all ages. 

As the Head of Liaison Officer, my job description is as follows:
- Contact the artist management 
- Make a clear contract with artist management 
- Handling the artist pre-departure needs (Accommodation, flight & referral letter) 
- Make the detail schedule from the first day until the end of the festival
- Prepare all the needs for guest in Melbourne
- Guests transport while in Melbourne
- Working with sponsorship division in terms of guests services
